MemberSignature.Value: public static SemWeb.Literal Parse (string literal, SemWeb.KnowledgeModel model, SemWeb.NamespaceManager namespaces);

Docs.param: The string value of the Literal.
The KnowledgeModel to associate with the Literal, or .
A NamespaceManager to use to resolve a QName in the datatype, or .
Docs.summary: Parses a Literal from an N3-style representation.

remarks.para: The string form must have the format: "value"@langid|^^datatype, where datatype is an angle-bracket-enclosed URI, or a qualified name. The only require part is the quote-enclosed value, and only one of the language and datatype can be given.
If is and a QName is found as the datatype, a is thrown.

Docs.value: The string value of the literal.
The language identifier of the literal, or .

Docs.summary: The datatype URI of the literal.
Docs.value: The datatype URI of the literal, or .

Docs.summary: A literal node in an RDF graph.
Docs.remarks: Literals are string values optionally with a language string or datatype URI.
